data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick M´gladbach.
In the minute 3, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Monchengladbach Schalke drive forward through Mark Uth. His shot is on target but it's saved.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 8, Denis Zakaria of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Schalke are coming forward and Matthew Hoppe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Schalke needs to be cautious. M´gladbach have an attacking throw-in.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 13, Steven Skrzybski (Schalke) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Schalke.
M´gladbach's Breel Embolo is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Florian Neuhaus.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Schalke.
At Borussia-Park, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Benito Raman.
In the minute 20, Mark Uth with an assist there.
Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Schalke have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to M´gladbach's area.
Steven Skrzybski (Schalke) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke just outside M´gladbach's area.
In the minute 26, Valentino Lazaro for M´gladbach has been booked by Manuel Grafe and receives a first yellow card.
In Monchengladbach Schalke attack through Mark Uth. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Manuel Grafe awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
In the minute 30, Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Monchengladbach.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kilian Ludewig (Schalke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oscar Wendt is on target to give M´gladbach a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 36, Great play from Florian Neuhaus to set up the goal.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Schalke.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 39, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
M´gladbach's Tony Jantschke misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 41, M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Schalke have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach are in shooting range from this free kick.
M´gladbach drive upfield and Breel Embolo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Schalke defender.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach attack but Alassane Plea's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Monchengladbach.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 47, Manuel Grafe signals a Schalke throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Schalke.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 49, Free kick M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Schalke.
Schalke's Malick Thiaw has been booked in Monchengladbach.
Alassane Plea for M´gladbach drives towards goal at Borussia-Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
M´gladbach take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Marcus Thuram.
In the minute 53, Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Manuel Grafe awards Schalke a goal kick.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Schalke.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match at Borussia-Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Benito Raman, who is down injured.
In the minute 57, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Schalke capitalize from this throw-in deep inside M´gladbach's half?
In the minute 58, Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
Schalke have a dangerous throw-in.
Schalke's Steven Skrzybski misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Schalke's Benito Raman is back in action after a slight knock.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 61, Free kick Schalke.
Alassane Plea of M´gladbach smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Manuel Baum (Schalke) is making a first change, with Alessandro Schopf replacing the possibly injured Benito Raman.
M´gladbach are coming forward and Marcus Thuram gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Schalke at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 65, Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
Stefan Lainer is replacing Valentino Lazaro for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Marco Rose is making the team's second substitution at Borussia-Park with Christoph Kramer replacing Denis Zakaria.
In the minute 66, Florian Neuhaus of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
M´gladbach drives forward and Alassane Plea gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Schalke will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from M´gladbach.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Breel Embolo with Lars Stindl. This is the third substitution made today by Marco Rose.
Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Monchengladbach.
Hannes Wolf is replacing Marcus Thuram for the home team.
In the minute 73, Schalke to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Manuel Grafe signals a Schalke throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to M´gladbach's area.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Schalke close to the penalty box.
M´gladbach's Patrick Herrmann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 76, Schalke have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Goal! Hannes Wolf extends M´gladbach's lead to 4-1.
In the minute 80, That's a fine assist from Alassane Plea.
Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a fifth substitution, with Laszlo Benes replacing Florian Neuhaus.
Nassim Boujellab is on a sub for Steven Skrzybski for Schalke.
In the minute 82, Schalke make their third substitution with Jan Luca Schuler replacing Matthew Hoppe.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, At Borussia-Park, Mark Uth has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 87, M´gladbach have a dangerous throw-in.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Manuel Grafe awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of M´gladbach.
Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Monchengladbach.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
It's 4-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
